titleStmt.title: The differences of the ages of mans life together with the originall causes, progresse, and end thereof. Written by the learned Henrie Cuffe, sometime fellow of Merton College in Oxford. Ann. Dom. 1600.
titleStmt.author: Cuff, Henry, 1563-1601.
R. M., fl. 1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Arnold Hatfield for Martin Clearke,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
